016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.server.resources;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Link;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Links;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.server.resources.ResourceContext;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapischema.ResourceDocumentSchema;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.JsonSchema;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Properties;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Types;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.server.annotations.AttributeSchema;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.server.annotations.Cardinality;
027import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.server.annotations.RelationshipSchema;
028import com.exoreaction.xorcery.lang.Enums;
029import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.BeanProperty;
030import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
031import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException;
032import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatVisitable;
033import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatVisitorWrapper;
034import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonObjectFormatVisitor;
035import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
036
037import java.lang.reflect.Field;
038import java.util.ArrayList;
039import java.util.Arrays;
040import java.util.List;
041import java.util.function.Consumer;
042
043import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.MediaTypes.APPLICATION_JSON_API;
044import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.describedby;
045import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.self;
046
047public interface JsonSchemaMixin
048        extends ResourceContext {
049
050    default Link selfLink() {
051        return Link.Builder.link("Self", "Self link", self, APPLICATION_JSON_API);
052    }
053
054    default Link describedbyLink(String schemaPath) {
055        return Link.Builder.link("JSON Schema", "JSON Schema for this resource", describedby, APPLICATION_JSON_API, schemaPath);
056    }
057
058    default Consumer<Properties.Builder> relationships(Enum<?>... relationshipEnums) {
059        return relationships ->
060        {
061            for (Enum<?> relationshipEnum : relationshipEnums) {
062                try {
063                    Field field = relationshipEnum.getClass().getField(relationshipEnum.name());
064
065                    RelationshipSchema schema = field.getAnnotation(RelationshipSchema.class);
066
067                    if (schema != null) {
068                        if (schema.cardinality().equals(Cardinality.one)) {
069                            relationships.property(relationshipEnum.name(),
070                                    new JsonSchema.Builder()
071                                            .oneOf(ResourceDocumentSchema.resourceObjectIdentifierRef,
072                                                    ResourceDocumentSchema.relationshipRelatedLinksRef)
073                                            .build());
074                        } else {
075                            relationships.property(relationshipEnum.name(), new JsonSchema.Builder()
076                                    .type(Types.Array)
077                                    .items(ResourceDocumentSchema.resourceObjectIdentifierRef,
078                                            ResourceDocumentSchema.relationshipRelatedLinksRef)
079                                    .build());
080                        }
081                    }
082                } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {
083                    e.printStackTrace();
084                }
085            }
086        };
087    }
088
089    default Consumer<Properties.Builder> attributes(Enum<?>... attrs) {
090        return attributes ->
091        {
092            for (Enum<?> attr : attrs) {
093                try {
094                    JsonSchema.Builder builder = new JsonSchema.Builder();
095                    Field field = attr.getClass().getField(attr.name());
096
097                    AttributeSchema schema = field.getAnnotation(AttributeSchema.class);
098                    Types attributeType;
099
100                    if (schema != null) {
101                        builder
102                                .title(schema.title())
103                                .description(schema.description())
104                                .type(schema.type());
105
106                        if (!Enum.class.equals(schema.values())) {
107                            builder.enums(Arrays
108                                    .stream((Enum<?>[]) schema.values().getEnumConstants())
109                                    .map(Enum::name)
110                                    .toArray(String[]::new));
111                        }
112                    } else {
113                        builder.title(attr.name());
114                        builder.type(Types.String);
115                    }
116
117                    attributes.property(Enums.toField(attr), builder.build());
118                } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {
119                    e.printStackTrace();
120                }
121            }
122        };
123    }
124
125    default Consumer<Links.Builder> websocket(String rel, Class<?> parameterClass) {
126        return links ->
127        {
128            final List<BeanProperty> commandProperties = new ArrayList<>();
129            try {
130                objectMapper().acceptJsonFormatVisitor(parameterClass, new JsonFormatVisitorWrapper.Base() {
131                    @Override
132                    public JsonObjectFormatVisitor expectObjectFormat(JavaType type) throws JsonMappingException {
133                        return new JsonObjectFormatVisitor.Base() {
134                            @Override
135                            public void property(BeanProperty prop) throws JsonMappingException {
136                                commandProperties.add(prop);
137                            }
138
139                            @Override
140                            public void property(String name, JsonFormatVisitable handler, JavaType propertyTypeHint) throws JsonMappingException {
141                                super.property(name, handler, propertyTypeHint);
142                            }
143
144                            @Override
145                            public void optionalProperty(BeanProperty prop) throws JsonMappingException {
146                                commandProperties.add(prop);
147                            }
148
149                            @Override
150                            public void optionalProperty(String name, JsonFormatVisitable handler, JavaType propertyTypeHint) throws JsonMappingException {
151                                super.optionalProperty(name, handler, propertyTypeHint);
152                            }
153                        };
154                    }
155                });
156            } catch (JsonMappingException e) {
157                throw new RuntimeException(e);
158            }
159
160            String submissionMediaType = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON;
161
162            List<String> required = new ArrayList<>();
163
164            Properties.Builder properties = new Properties.Builder();
165            for (BeanProperty property : commandProperties) {
166
167                JsonSchema.Builder builder = new JsonSchema.Builder()
168                        .type(Types.typeOf(property.getType().getRawClass()))
169                        .title(property.getName());
170
171                AttributeSchema schema = property.getAnnotation(AttributeSchema.class);
172                if (schema != null) {
173                    if (schema.required()) {
174                        required.add(property.getName());
175                    }
176
177                    builder.title(schema.title())
178                            .description(schema.description());
179                } else {
180                    builder.title(property.getName());
181                    required.add(property.getName());
182                }
183
184                if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(property.getType().getRawClass())) {
185                    builder.enums(Arrays
186                            .stream((Enum<?>[]) property.getType().getRawClass().getEnumConstants())
187                            .map(Enum::name)
188                            .toArray(String[]::new));
189                }
190
191                properties.property(property.getName(), builder.build());
192            }
193
194            JsonSchema websocketParametersSchema = new JsonSchema.Builder()
195                    .type(Types.Object)
196                    .additionalProperties(false)
197                    .required(required.toArray(new String[0]))
198                    .properties(properties.build())
199                    .build();
200
201            Link.Builder builder = new Link.Builder()
202                    .rel(rel)
203                    .href("{+websocket_href}")
204                    .templateRequired("websocket_href")
205                    .templatePointer("websocket_href", "0/data/links/" + rel)
206                    .submissionMediaType(submissionMediaType);
207
208            builder.submissionSchema(websocketParametersSchema);
209
210            links.link(builder.build());
211        };
212    }
213}
